rules.comment: This example shows how to create a permission that can be used to grant administrative privileges over the 'Product1' container in the 'SaaS-Applications' workspace. In this case, this permission is allowing the user dtijerina-containeradministrator or the application app-integration-containeradministrator these privileges. Once this permissions is created, it needs to be assigned to a role and then the role granted to dtijerina-containeradministrator or the application app-integration-containeradministrator.
